ARABIC: فَأَنجَيْنَٰهُ وَأَصْحَٰبَ ٱلسَّفِينَةِ وَجَعَلْنَٰهَآ ءَايَةً لِّلْعَٰلَمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We rescued him and the occupants of the Ark and made that into a Sign for all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But We saved him and those with him in the ark, and made it a sign for the creatures of the world.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then We rescued Noah together with the people in the Ark and made it (that is, the Ark) a lesson for all people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We saved Noah and the people in the Ark and made (their case) a miracle for the world.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We rescued him and the people aboard the ship, and made the ship a sign for the entire world.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then We saved him and the Companions of the Boat, and made it an Ayah for all people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So We delivered him and the inmates of the ark, and made it a sign to the nations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Yet We delivered him, and those who were in the ship, and appointed it for a sign unto all beings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We rescued him and those with him in the ship, and made of it a portent for the peoples.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But We saved him and those who were with him in the Ark and made the event a sign for mankind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then We delivered him and those in the ark, and made it a sign unto the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then We delivered him and those who were in the Ark, and made it a sign for all the nations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But We saved him and the companions of the Ark, and We made the (Ark) a Sign for all peoples!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then We saved him and those with him in the ship, and made it (the ship) as an Ayah (a lesson, a warning, etc.) for the 'Alamin (mankind, jinns and all that exists).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But We saved him and all who were in the Ark, and made (the event) a sign to the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But We saved him, together with the company of the Ark, and We made it a sign for all peoples.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But We saved him and the companions of the ship, and We made it a sign for the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [29:15] Then We delivered him, namely, Noah, and the occupants of the ship, those who were with him in it, and We made this a sign, a lesson, for all peoples, for [all] peoples that would come after them, should they disobey the messengers sent to them. Noah lived for a further sixty years or more after the Flood, until mankind multiplied [again].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We rescued him) Noah (and those with him in the ship) and those who believed in him who were aboard the ship, (and made of it) i.e. the ship of Noah (a portent) a lesson (for the peoples) after them.
